name: nnsplit
description: Fast, robust sentence splitting with bindings for Python, Rust and Javascript.

scripts.build: wasm-pack build && npm install --no-save pkg/ && cp -a package.json pkg/package.json && mv pkg/nnsplit_javascript.js pkg/nnsplit.js
scripts.start_test_server: cd dev_server && npm install && node prepare_data.js && npx webpack-dev-server --port=8080

author: Benjamin Minixhofer <bminixhofer@gmail.com>
